features: 🏡【𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐤】Halitaa multifunctional all-in-one computer desk comes with charging station, LED lights, drawers, shelves, large desktop, etc. It has enough space to easily meet your various needs. It is a good choice as a office desk, computer table, study table, writing desk, or game desk.

📚【𝐀𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞】This home office desk has large desktop provides plenty of space for computer, printer, books, files and other office supplies, 2 drawers and 3-tier storage shelves to store your artwork, potted plants, and framed family photos and other daily necessities, keeping your desktop neat and organized.

💎【𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐃𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐭𝐲𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡】This computer desk with hutch workstation is constructed of high-quality board and thick steel frame, which ensures the stability and durability of the desk. Rustic grey computer desk with simple and modern design perfectly matches various decoration styles and adds a stylish atmosphere to your home and office.

⚡【𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐤 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐋𝐄𝐃 𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬】This gaming desk comes with 2 USB ports and 3 AC outlets, providing added convenience for charging your electronic devices. The cool Led light strip has over 20 colors and 22 dynamic modes, you can choose the light brightness and speed mode according to needs and scenes which creates fantastic ambiance in your room.

🔨【𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐥𝐞】59.06"(L) x 21.65"(W) x 59.06"(H). This writing desk comes with detailed instructions and all necessary hardware. You can easily assemble it by yourself. Halitaa provides 12 months warranty and 24 hours customer service to solve any problems you encounter, Please feel free to contact Halitaa service team.

📦【𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐘𝐨𝐮 𝐆𝐞𝐭】Desk with 2 Drawers, Desk with Storage Shelves, Desk with Hutch, Desk with Charging Station, Desk with LED Lights, Desk with Host Shelf, Desk with Monitor Stand with Non-Slip Pads, Desk with Adjustable Height Feet, Desk with Printer Stand, Desk with Large Desktop. The simple design and multifunctional storage meet different needs and is an ideal desk to create a good home office space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Halitaa Gaming Desk with Drawer, Hutch, Power Outlet and LED lights

This computer desk with charging station is perfect for any home or office. The spacious tabletop provides plenty of room for your computer, monitor, keyboard, and other office supplies, while the built-in charging station keeps your devices powered up and organized.
Versatile Computer Desk can be used as home office desk or gaming desk
Ample Storage Space - 2 Drawers, Host shelf, Open Storage Shelves
The spacious and flat desktop is easy to organize and clean. Movable Monitor Stand effectively improving your sitting posture. The adjustable height feet prevent wobbling and scratching.

Functional partition: A printer can be placed on the left desktop, and printing paper or documents can be placed below. The storage rack can be used to store various artworks, books, photo frames, etc. The large desktop on the right is neat and orderly and comfortable to use.

Is this Computer Desk easy to assemble? Halitaa office desk comes with all accessories and detailed instructions which are divided into step-by-step tutorials. Just to follow it and complete the installation. Each board and parts are numbered for easy installation. Is this gaming desk stable? Will it shake? Halitaa Computer Desk is very stable. You can find number 12(BACK PANEL BUCKLE) in the part list, which can make the desk more stable and not shake. Find a suitable position on the back and screw it in. ( Please check step 21 on the instruction.) What can I do if it damages or misses any parts? You can message us at any time, we will solve the problem for you in 24 Hours. If you have any questions about this home office desk, please message us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the price.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our granddaughter for Christmas. It took my husband and 15-year-old grandson about four hours to assemble it. (great bonding time😉) Sturdy and perfect for her needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great desk very sturdy comfortable was able to place my 40-in Vizio without the legs at the back of the desk works great no missing parts lights were out manufacturer replaced them quickly no problems love the desk the back shelving is excellent couldn't live without it highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall desk was nice , within first week of using the desk - the lights wont turn on !! Very disappointed as this was a major reason for purchasing this desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk, cheap lights
reviews.reviewText: The LEDs died after about two hours of use so I'd recommend buying a better set if you want them on here. Besides that, the desk is nice. It is heavier than all get out and feels sturdy once it's built. I got it on sale for about $170 and my day-one impression is that I got my money's worth. Sucks about the lights but LEDs are cheap and easy to cut to size. More of an inconvenience than anything.
